brief.why: cmd_log shows updated events with ~ icon but doesn't say what changed (title edit vs tactical clear vs wait). All mutations look identical in the feed.
brief.what: 1. Add a verb or context field to updated_at tracking (e.g. updated_by_command) 2. Display in cmd_log output (e.g. '~ edited title' vs '~ cleared tactical') 3. Update cmd_show to surface what changed
brief.done: bon log shows distinct verbs for different mutation types. A user can tell what happened without reading items.jsonl.
